documentation.text:
Used by Secondary pools to request settlement for trades
@param  tradeToReport     data structure holding order matching data

Fetches trade settlement requests for depository participant
@param  dpid         identifier of depository participant (eg, transfer agent) that is authorized to settle the asset

Fetches a specific trade settlement request        
@param  ref         reference to the trade

arguments.value: Settlement not done by depositary participant

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Settlement not done by depositary participant"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Settlement done by invalid depositary participant"

arguments.value: Settlement done by invalid depositary participant

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Settlement done by invalid depositary participant"

documentation.text:

@param  party         reference to the party or counterparty in a trade

@param  tradeToReport     data structure holding order matching data

Fetches trade settlement requests for depository participant
@param  dpid         identifier of depository participant (eg, transfer agent) that is authorized to settle the asset

Fetches a specific trade settlement request        
@param  ref         reference to the trade

attributes.text:
Gets transfer agent for any of the parties in the trade
@param  party         reference to the party or counterparty in a trade

params.dpid: identifier of depository participant (eg, transfer agent) that is authorized to settle the asset

params._factory: reference to the secondary issue pool factory contract
params._issueFeePercentage: percentage of trading fee to be charged by the asset manager

params.amount: amount of asset issued in pool

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tradeToReport: data structure holding order matching data

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getSettlementRequest(bytes32).notice: Fetches a specific trade settlement request

getSettlementRequests(bytes32).notice: Fetches trade settlement requests for depository participant

issueSecondary(address,address,uint256,b.notice: Joins existing (secondary) tokenized assets into pool by primary issue token holders

requestSettlement((bytes32,bool,string,u.notice: Used by Secondary pools to request settlement for trades

setSettlementStatus(bytes32,bytes32).notice: Sets settlement status for trades executed
